title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp:120cm (47 1/4in.). Weft: 70cm (27 1/2in.)
B. Warp: 24.5cm (9 1/2in.). Weft:  71cm (28in.)
Both selvedges present in both pieces.
description: Four scenes personifying the four continents with the names written underneath; Africa, Asia, Europe, America. In red on white.
